long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Step into a battle for survival and dominance through the ages in Age of War Unblocked! Lead your civilization from prehistoric times to the future, strategize your way to victory, and defend your base from endless enemy attacks.

Why Install Age of War Unblocked?

Evolutionary Gameplay: Experience five distinct eras with unique units and challenges for each age.
Balanced Strategy: Enjoy a mix of tower defense and real-time strategy that keeps you on your toes.
Resource Management: Plan upgrades and unit training carefully to outlast your opponents.
Endless Replayability: Face unique battles each time as you try new strategies and conquer new ages.
Accessible, Unblocked Fun: Play without restrictions on any network—school, work, or home!
Highlights of Age of War Unblocked
⚔️ Train units from cavemen to futuristic robots as you evolve through ages.
🏰 Build strong defenses to protect your base from waves of enemy attacks.
💥 Use special attacks to deal massive damage in critical moments.
🌐 Accessible on all networks with no download required.
🏆 Challenge yourself with achievements and strive to be the ultimate strategist!

Ready to lead your civilization through time? Install Age of War Unblocked now and see if you can conquer through the ages!
